body: This emerald vest has four prominent and bulging pockets along its front. The wearer is always treated as if using a healer's kit when making Heal checks . Once per day, the wearer can make a DC 20 Heal check as if attempting to treat deadly wounds. If the check is successful, it cures 1d4 points of ability damage instead of hit point damage.
name: Vest of Surgery
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Chest/Chest Slot Wondrous Items/Vest of Surgery
